content: 2. Update AppConstants.java, creating a new entry for your component under Dashboard.Type. The name of this entry should match exactly the TYPE property defined in the frontend. 4. Create a new class to represent the updates of your component under esthesis.services.dashboard.impl.dto.update. The class should be named DashboardUpdate<type>.java. 6. Update DashboardUpdateJobFactory.java to include the job helper for your component. 8. Update DashboardUpdateJob.java, by adding your component in the execute method's switch block. Depending on the type of your component, you should probably create a helper class to handle the actual update logic. 10. (Optional) Create a configuration class to capture the configuration of your component under esthesis.services.dashboard.impl.dto.config. The class should be named DashboardItem<type>Configuration.java.
